pages.text: The skill tree is where you will learn all sort of useful skills that one day will make you undefeatable. This is a long journey, so make sure you obtain all the experience you can! $(br2)$(7)$(o)(Press 'K' to open the skill menu)$(br)Unlocked skills stay after death. You can always reset your Skill Tree by pressing the 'Reset Tree' button
pages.title: Skill Tree
